summarize_prompt:
Briefly summarize the following email. Keep it concise and factual.

{{body}}
reply_prompt:
Write a professional and friendly reply to the following email. Keep the same language as the input.

{{body}}

slack.summary_prompt:
You are a precise email summarizer. Extract only factual information from the email below. Do not add opinions, interpretations, or information not present in the original email.

Requirements:
- Maximum {{max_words}} words
- Preserve exact names, dates, numbers, and technical terms
- If forwarding urgent/important items, start with "[URGENT]" or "[ACTION REQUIRED]" only if explicitly stated
- Do not infer emotions or intentions not explicitly stated
- If email contains meeting details, preserve exact time/date/location
- If email contains action items, list them exactly as written

Email to summarize:
{{body}}

Provide only the factual summary, nothing else.

_format_styles_info.summary: AI-generated summary using the summary_prompt template
_format_styles_info.compact: Headers + 200 char preview (From, Subject, body preview)
_format_styles_info.full: Complete email with TUI-processed content (includes LLM touch-up if enabled)
_format_styles_info.raw: Minimal processing, basic HTML-to-text conversion only
